00037 /* Creation flags */
00038 #define XNREUSE  0x00000001     /* Reuse pod with identical properties */
00039 
00040 /* Pod status flags */
00041 #define XNRPRIO  0x00000002     /* Reverse priority scheme */
00042 #define XNTIMED  0x00000004     /* Timer started */
00043 #define XNTMSET  0x00000008     /* Pod time has been set */
00044 #define XNTMPER  0x00000010     /* Periodic timing */
00045 #define XNFATAL  0x00000020     /* Pod encountered a fatal error */
00046 #define XNPIDLE  0x00000040     /* Pod is unavailable (initializing/shutting down) */
00047 #define XNTLOCK  0x00000080     /* Timer lock pending */
00048 
00049 /* Sched status flags */
00050 #define XNKCOUT  0x80000000     /* Sched callout context */
00051 #define XNHTICK  0x40000000     /* Host tick pending  */
00052 
00053 /* These flags are available to the real-time interfaces */
00054 #define XNPOD_SPARE0  0x01000000
00055 #define XNPOD_SPARE1  0x02000000
00056 #define XNPOD_SPARE2  0x04000000
00057 #define XNPOD_SPARE3  0x08000000
00058 #define XNPOD_SPARE4  0x10000000
00059 #define XNPOD_SPARE5  0x20000000
00060 #define XNPOD_SPARE6  0x40000000
00061 #define XNPOD_SPARE7  0x80000000
00062 
00063 /* Flags for context checking */
00064 #define XNPOD_THREAD_CONTEXT     0x1 /* Regular thread */
00065 #define XNPOD_INTERRUPT_CONTEXT  0x2 /* Interrupt service thread */
00066 #define XNPOD_HOOK_CONTEXT       0x4 /* Nanokernel hook */
00067 #define XNPOD_ROOT_CONTEXT       0x8 /* Root thread */
00068 
00069 #define XNPOD_NORMAL_EXIT  0x0
00070 #define XNPOD_FATAL_EXIT   0x1
00071 
00072 #define XNPOD_DEFAULT_TICKHANDLER  (&xnpod_announce_tick)
00073 
00074 #define XNPOD_ALL_CPUS  XNARCH_CPU_MASK_ALL
00075 
00076 #define XNPOD_HEAPSIZE  (CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SYS_HEAPSZ * 1024)
00077 #define XNPOD_PAGESIZE  512
00078 #define XNPOD_RUNPRIO   0x80000000 /* Placeholder for "stdthread priority" */
00079 
00080 /* Flags for xnpod_schedule_runnable() */
00081 #define XNPOD_SCHEDFIFO 0x0
00082 #define XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO 0x1
00083 #define XNPOD_NOSWITCH  0x2
00084 
00085 /* Normal root thread priority == min_std_prio - 1 */
00086 #define XNPOD_ROOT_PRIO_BASE   ((nkpod)->root_prio_base)

00161 #define xnsched_resched_mask() \

00165     (!xnarch_cpus_empty(xnsched_resched_mask()))

00176 #define xnsched_clr_mask(__sched__) \
00177     xnarch_cpus_clear((__sched__)->resched)

00279 static inline void xnpod_reset_watchdog (xnsched_t *sched)
00280 {
00281     sched->watchdog_trigger = xnarch_get_cpu_tsc() + nkpod->watchdog_reload;
00282     sched->watchdog_armed = 0;
00283 }

00290 static inline int xnpod_get_qdir (xnpod_t *pod)
00291 {
00292     /* Returns the queuing direction of threads for a given pod */
00293     return testbits(pod->status,XNRPRIO) ? xnqueue_up : xnqueue_down;
00294 }
00295 
00296 static inline int xnpod_get_minprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00297 {
00298     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00299         pod->minpri + incr :
00300         pod->minpri - incr;
00301 }
00302 
00303 static inline int xnpod_get_maxprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00304 {
00305     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00306         pod->maxpri - incr :
00307         pod->maxpri + incr;
00308 }
00309 
00310 static inline int xnpod_compare_prio (int inprio, int outprio)
00311 {
00312     /* Returns a negative, null or positive value whether inprio is
00313        lower than, equal to or greater than outprio. */
00314     int delta = inprio - outprio;
00315     return testbits(nkpod->status,XNRPRIO) ? -delta : delta;
00316 }
00317 
00318 static inline int xnpod_rescale_prio (int prio)
00319 {
00320     return xnpod_get_qdir(nkpod) == xnqueue_up ?
00321         nkpod->minpri - prio :
00322         nkpod->maxpri - prio - 1;
00323 }
00324 
00325 static inline void xnpod_renice_root (int prio)
00326 {
00327     xnthread_t *rootcb;
00328     spl_t s;
00329 
00330     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00331     rootcb = &nkpod->sched[xnarch_current_cpu()].rootcb;
00332     rootcb->cprio = prio;
00333     xnpod_schedule_runnable(rootcb,XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO|XNPOD_NOSWITCH);
00334     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00335 }
00336 
00337     /* -- Beginning of the exported interface */
00338 
00339 #define xnpod_sched_slot(cpu) \
00340     (&nkpod->sched[cpu])
00341 
00342 #define xnpod_current_sched() \
00343     xnpod_sched_slot(xnarch_current_cpu())
00344 
00345 #define xnpod_interrupt_p() \
00346     (xnpod_current_sched()->inesting > 0)
00347 
00348 #define xnpod_callout_p() \
00349     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_sched()->status,XNKCOUT))
00350 
00351 #define xnpod_asynch_p() \
00352     (xnpod_interrupt_p() || xnpod_callout_p())
00353 
00354 #define xnpod_current_thread() \
00355     (xnpod_current_sched()->runthread)
00356 
00357 #define xnpod_current_root() \
00358     (&xnpod_current_sched()->rootcb)
00359 
00360 #define xnpod_current_p(thread) \
00361     (xnpod_current_thread() == (thread))
00362 
00363 #define xnpod_locked_p() \
00364     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK))
00365 
00366 #define xnpod_unblockable_p() \
00367     (xnpod_asynch_p() || testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK|XNROOT))
00368 
00369 #define xnpod_root_p() \
00370     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT))
00371 
00372 #define xnpod_shadow_p() \
00373     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNSHADOW))
00374 
00375 #define xnpod_userspace_p() \
00376     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT|XNSHADOW))
00377 
00378 #define xnpod_primary_p() \
00379     (!(xnpod_asynch_p() || xnpod_root_p()))
00380 
00381 #define xnpod_secondary_p() \
00382     (xnpod_root_p())
00383 
00384 #define xnpod_idle_p() xnpod_root_p()
00385 
00386 #define xnpod_timeset_p() \
00387     (!!testbits(nkpod->status,XNTMSET))

00389 static inline u_long xnpod_get_ticks2sec (void)
00390 {
00391     return nkpod->ticks2sec;
00392 }
00393 
00394 static inline u_long xnpod_get_tickval (void)
00395 {
00396     /* Returns the duration of a tick in nanoseconds */
00397     return nkpod->tickvalue;
00398 }
00399 
00400 static inline xntime_t xnpod_ticks2ns (xnticks_t ticks)
00401 {
00402     /* Convert a count of ticks in nanoseconds */
00403 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00404     return ticks * xnpod_get_tickval();
00405 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00406     return ticks;
00407 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00408 }
00409 
00410 static inline xnticks_t xnpod_ns2ticks (xntime_t t)
00411 {
00412 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00413     return xnarch_ulldiv(t,xnpod_get_tickval(),NULL);
00414 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00415     return t;
00416 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00417 }

00475 static inline void xnpod_lock_sched (void)
00476 {
00477     spl_t s;
00478 
00479     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00480 
00481     if (nkpod->schedlck++ == 0)
00482         __setbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00483 
00484     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00485 }
00486 
00487 static inline void xnpod_unlock_sched (void)
00488 {
00489     spl_t s;
00490 
00491     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00492 
00493     if (--nkpod->schedlck == 0)
00494         {
00495         __clrbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00496         xnpod_schedule();
00497         }
00498 
00499     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00500 }

00531 static inline void xnpod_yield (void)
00532 {
00533     xnpod_resume_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),0);

00552 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_STATS
00553 static inline void xnpod_acc_exec_time(xnsched_t *sched, xnthread_t *thread)
00554 {
00555     xnticks_t now = xnarch_get_cpu_tsc();
00556 
00557     thread->stat.exec_time += now - sched->last_csw;
00558     sched->last_csw = now;
00559 }
00560 
00561 static inline void xnpod_reset_exec_stats(xnthread_t *thread)
00562 {
00563     thread->stat.exec_time = 0;
00564     thread->stat.exec_start = xnarch_get_cpu_tsc();
00565 }
00566 
00567 static inline void xnpod_update_csw_date(xnsched_t *sched)
00568 {
00569     sched->last_csw = xnarch_get_cpu_tsc();
00570 }
